list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: add `toMap` serialization and update test coverage
This commit introduces `toMap` methods to `ApiQuery` and `ApiQueryFilteringGroup` for serialization. It also includes:
- New tests to verify the `toMap` serialization in `query_test.dart` and `query_filter_group_test.dart`. - A new test for `QueryOperation.toShortQueryOperation` in `query_operation_test.dart`. - Updates to `lcov.info` to reflect improved test coverage.

task.summary:
chore: add MIT license and contribution guidelines
This commit introduces an MIT license file and a set of contribution guidelines for the Filterator package. It also includes:
- `.github` folder with templates for bug reports, feature requests, and pull requests. - Update to `README.md` with the correct pub.dev link. - Update to `pubspec.yaml` to include `very_good_analysis`. - Update to `analysis_options.yaml` to use `very_good_analysis`. - Minor refactor in `ApiQueryOrdering` to remove the generic type `T`. - Minor refactor in `ApiQuery` to update the generic type for `ordering`. - Corrected import paths in `supy_converter.dart` and `fiterator_test.dart`. - Added `.idea/workspace.xml` and `.idea/libraries/Dart_Packages.xml` to `.gitignore` (implicitly, as these are new files).

refactor: Update import paths and minor code style
This commit updates import paths to use package-relative paths (e.g., `package:filterator/src/...`) across several files. It also includes minor code style adjustments such as:
- Making `ApiQuery` constructor parameters `const` where applicable in tests. - Reordering imports in test files. - Removing trailing whitespace. - Slightly adjusting the order of named parameters in the `paginate` function. - Updating the package description in `pubspec.yaml`. - Removing an unused generic type parameter from `IApiQueryFilteringGroup` and its implementations. - Simplifying list transformations in `SupyConverter`. - Minor adjustments to string literals in `ODataConverter`. - Using method tear-offs for `fold` operations in `CompositeConverter`. - Removing redundant `null` assignments in mock constructors in OData tests.

refactor: Remove generic types and update converter paths
This commit refactors the codebase to remove generic type parameters `T` from `ApiQuery`, `IApiQuery`, `ApiStandardConverter`, `SupyConverter`, `ODataConverter`, and related classes and methods. This simplifies the API and removes unnecessary type constraints.
Additionally, converter implementations (`SupyConverter`, `ODataConverter`) have been moved from the `lib/src/standards` directory to the `example` directory to clarify their role as usage examples rather than core library components. The `GraphQLConverter` and `CompositeConverter` have been removed.
Other changes include: - Renamed `filtering` to `filters` in `IApiQueryFilteringGroup` and its implementations for clarity. - Updated `filterator_example.dart` to include examples for `ODataConverter` and a new `ResetApiConverter`. - Added `ResetApiConverter` as an example of a custom converter for REST APIs. - Updated `README.md` to reflect the changes in converter usage and provide an example for custom converters. - Adjusted import paths and test files to reflect the new locations of converters. - Removed unused `converters_test.dart` and related files. - Updated `pubspec.yaml` topics. - Removed unused exception file.

docs: remove raw map example from README
This commit removes the example demonstrating how to get the request body as a raw map using `converter.body()` from the README.md.

chore: Update CHANGELOG for initial beta release
This commit updates the CHANGELOG.md file to reflect the initial beta release version as `0.1.0-beta.1`.

docs: update README and pubspec for beta release
This commit updates the `README.md` and `pubspec.yaml` files for the initial beta release (`0.1.0-beta.1`).
Changes include: - Updating the dependency version in `README.md` to `^0.1.0-beta.1`. - Removing extra newlines and whitespace from code examples in `README.md`. - Updating the package description in `pubspec.yaml` for better clarity. - Minor changes in `.idea/workspace.xml` reflecting the commit history.

chore: bump version to 0.1.2-beta.1 and remove meta dependency
This commit updates the package version to `0.1.2-beta.1` in `pubspec.yaml` and `README.md`. It also removes the `meta` package from the dependencies as it is no longer required.

refactor: Organize tests into core directory and remove unused files
This commit reorganizes the test files by moving them into a `core` subdirectory within the `test` folder. It also involves the following changes:
- Deleted unused files: - `packages/filterator/lib/src/core/field_types.dart` - `packages/filterator/lib/src/core/selection.dart` - `packages/filterator/test/query_tests/query_operators_test.dart` (functionality moved) - `packages/filterator/test/query_tests/query_tests.dart` - `packages/filterator/test/query_tests/query_tools_test.dart` (functionality moved) - Updated `packages/filterator/lib/src/core/query.dart` to remove the static `cast` method from `ApiQuery`. - Updated `packages/filterator/test/fiterator_test.dart` to import tests from the new `core` directory. - Created new test files in `packages/filterator/test/core/`: - `converter_tests.dart`: Basic tests for `ApiStandardConverter`. - `query_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQuery` construction and `toMap` serialization. - `paging_operators_test.dart`: (Renamed from `query_tests/paging_operators_test.dart`) Tests for paging helper functions and `ApiQuery` `toMap` with complex filtering. - `query_filter_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryFilter` construction and `toMap` serialization, including `cloneApiQueryFilter`. - `query_metadata_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryMetadata` construction, `empty` factory, and `toMap`. - `query_filter_group_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryFilteringGroup` construction, shortcut constructors, `toMap` serialization with nested groups, and `cloneApiQueryFilteringGroup`. - `query_operators_test.dart`: Tests for helper functions for paging, filter groups, filters, ordering, and selections. - `query_operation_test.dart`: Tests for `QueryOperationStringExtension`, `QueryOperationExtension`, and `QueryOrderDirectionExtension`. - `query_ordering_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryOrdering` construction, `toMap`, and `cloneApiQueryOrdering`. - `query_response_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryResponse` construction, `empty` factory, and `toMap`. - `query_paging_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryPaging` construction, factories, `copyWith`, `toMap`, and `cloneApiQueryPaging`. - `query_selections_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQuerySelection` construction, cloning, `copyWith`, and `toMap` serialization. - Updated `packages/filterator/lib/src/core/core.dart` to remove the export of `field_types.dart`.

refactor: Organize tests into core directory and remove unused files

- Deleted unused files: - `packages/filterator/lib/src/core/field_types.dart` - `packages/filterator/lib/src/core/selection.dart` - `packages/filterator/test/query_tests/query_operators_test.dart` (functionality moved) - `query_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQuery` construction and `toMap` serialization. - `paging_operators_test.dart`: (Renamed from `query_tests/paging_operators_test.dart`) Tests for paging helper functions and `ApiQuery` `toMap` with complex filtering. - `query_response_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryResponse` construction, `empty` factory, and `toMap`. - `query_paging_test.dart`: Tests for `ApiQueryPaging` construction, factories, `copyWith`, `toMap`, and `cloneApiQueryPaging`. - chore: add MIT license and contribution guidelines
This commit introduces an MIT license file and a set of contribution guidelines for the Filterator package. It also includes:
- `.github` folder with templates for bug reports, feature requests, and pull requests. - Update to `README.md` with the correct pub.dev link. - Update to `pubspec.yaml` to include `very_good_analysis`. - Update to `analysis_options.yaml` to use `very_good_analysis`. - Minor refactor in `ApiQueryOrdering` to remove the generic type `T`. - Minor refactor in `ApiQuery` to update the generic type for `ordering`. - Corrected import paths in `supy_converter.dart` and `fiterator_test.dart`. - Added `.idea/workspace.xml` and `.idea/libraries/Dart_Packages.xml` to `.gitignore` (implicitly, as these are new files).

refactor: Update import paths and minor code style

The `GraphQLConverter` and `CompositeConverter` have been removed.
Other changes include: - Renamed `filtering` to `filters` in `IApiQueryFilteringGroup` and its implementations for clarity. - Updated `filterator_example.dart` to include examples for `ODataConverter` and a new `ResetApiConverter`. - Added `ResetApiConverter` as an example of a custom converter for REST APIs. - Updated `README.md` to reflect the changes in converter usage and provide an example for custom converters. - Adjusted import paths and test files to reflect the new locations of converters. - Removed unused `converters_test.dart` and related files. - Updated `pubspec.yaml` topics. - Removed unused exception file.

option.value:
feat: add `toMap` serialization and update test coverage
This commit introduces `toMap` methods to `ApiQuery` and `ApiQueryFilteringGroup` for serialization. It also includes:
- New tests to verify the `toMap` serialization in `query_test.dart` and `query_filter_group_test.dart`. - A new test for `QueryOperation.toShortQueryOperation` in `query_operation_test.dart`. - Updates to `lcov.info` to reflect improved test coverage.
